item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 2, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:

22. China tells its AI leaders to avoid U.S. travel over security concerns (339 points | 293 comments)
23. Backyard bird has a lot to teach us about sex variability (25 points | 2 comments)

26. Video encoding requires using your eyes (77 points | 35 comments)
27. GLP-1 drugs: An economic disruptor? (2024) (324 points | 427 comments)

29. 3,200% CPU Utilization (464 points | 206 comments)
